Name: Eccentrica Daiquiri
Ingredients: 45 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Daiquiris are refreshing but I believe this mastiha and birch water influenced example is particularly so.
History: Created in August 2015 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room, London, England. Named after a character in Douglas Adams' The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy by the name of Eccentrica Gallumbits.
Nutrition: One serving of Eccentrica Daiquiri contains 161 calories
